text:
hiii, can anybody help me to update  the lifecyclestage and leadstatus values while creating the contact in HubSpot crm here is the endpoint i am calling with data below <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/>
{
    "properties": {
        "email": "<mailto:exampfrrcdesdewnk@HubSpot.com|exampfrrcdesdewnk@HubSpot.com>",
        "firstname": "Janede",
        "lastname": "Doe2",
        "phone": "(555) 555-55555",
        "company": "HubSpot",
        "website": "<http://HubSpot.com|HubSpot.com>",
        "lifecyclestage": "lead",
        "leadstatus" : "IN Progress",
        "tags": "testing tag"
    }
}
leadStatus is not updating and tags also not there

Hi Everyone
I want to track an app installation
how many times the app is installed
Do you provide an API endpoint for tracking the app installation

Hi there, I need to know how to add a contact to a list through HubSpot API. When new user signup we need to push that contact to HubSpot and to the List in HubSpot. Could anyone help me find the API that does it please? Really appreciate it

<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/>
use the above endpoint and below payload data
{
    "properties": {
        "firstname": "John",
        "lastname": "Doeedjks",
        "phone": "<tel:1234567890|123-456-7890>",
        "lifecyclestage": "lead",
        "hs_lead_status": "NEW",
        "tags": "",
        "notes": ""
    }
}to create a contact
Hi <@U07B71AH7BQ> Thank you for this but I have it done already and now I need to associate this contact to a list in HubSpot through the API
what list you need associate do you want to create multiple contacts in single api
Hi, does anyone know if it is possible to create a "Page view" manually through the API? Se attached picture for reference. Would be lovely if this could be possible.

I don’t think it is possible using API. But you can create it using the CRM Development tools.

For Reference : <https://app.HubSpot.com/docs/40207483/reference/ui-components/standard-components/step-indicator>
What's your json body? the error message looks pretty self explanatory
hello can anybody share the endpoint to create a custom property called tag in the HubSpot crm contacts

I believe you are looking to create a custom property in contacts object. That can be done directly through the UI.

If incase you still need the api.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/properties>
UPDATE: I ended up just switching over to use RestSharp.RestClient .NET library and figured everything out. Thanks for the help!
Hi everyone! Do we need an API in order to get omnisend data(email marketing) to HubSpot?
hi guys i am trying to create a note for the contact using this <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/notes> but it is not reflecting in the HubSpot dashboard
